attributes.action: recommend to the Queen to confer a knighthood on Bruce Forsyth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to recommend to the Queen to confer a knighthood on Bruce Forsyth
Bruce Forsyth has been in showbusiness for more than five decades and in those five decades we have seen him dance, sing, joke, host gameshows that are now legendary and above all we have seen him stand the test of time
He is back hosting primetime television on Saturdays and has introduced his talent to new generations of fans such as myself.
I know Mr Forsyth has been honoured by Her Majesty The Queen once before but can you recommend to our Queen to utter the words Arise Sir Bruce to Mr Forsyth at Buckingham Palace. I would be proud knowing it was because of me that Bruce was a Knight Of The Realm

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
